name: Beef and Swiss Wrap
author: Marty Courtney
summary: Using multi-grain wraps with thin slices of roast beef and cheese along with veggies makes this a healthy lunch on the go. It's like a salad in a wrap!
directions: Heat the wraps in the microwave on High for 30 seconds
On the right side of one wrap (the side that will fold in last), spread 1 tablespoon Neufchatel cheese about 2/3 of the way down that side
Layer half of the romaine, spinach, beef, Swiss cheese, and tomatoes in the center of the wrap, leaving 1/3 of the wrap open at the bottom
Fold that third up over the bottom of your fillings, then fold in the left side and roll toward the right, letting the Neufchatel seal the wrap together
